Rulings.Tengu:
●If an effect is chained to Sea Koala's effect that removes every other Beast-Type monster from your side of the field, the effect of Sea Koala disappears.
●After making the ATK of 1 of your opponent's monsters 0, the ATK of the opponent's monster remains 0 until the End Phase. even if every other Beast-Type monster you control is removed from the field.

Rulings.Cat:
● If an effect is chained to 'Sea Koala's' effect that removes every other Beast from your side of the field, the effect of 'Sea Koala' disappears.
● After making the ATK of 1 of your opponent's monsters 0, the ATK of the opponent's monster remains 0 until the End Phase. even if every other Beast you control leaves the field.

Rulings.Base: 1. If an effect is chained to the effect of "Sea Koala" that removes every other Beast-Type monster from your side of the field, the effect of "Sea Koala" disappears.\n2. After making the ATK of 1 of your opponent's monsters 0, the ATK of the opponent's monster remains 0 until the End Phase. even if every other Beast-Type monster you control is removed from the field.
